ModMetaData.name: Shuttle Start for Mechanitor
ModMetaData.author: alite
ModMetaData.description:
This patch mod changes the Mechanitor start from using a drop pod approach to having the mechanitor standing around with an empty shuttle nearby. Nothing else in the Mechanitor scenario is changed by this mod.
[url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3544024494]Rich Explorer Version[/url] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561199377833097/myworkshopfiles/]The preview and mod icon were made by Elseud[/url]
